content:
You're welcome! I'm glad I could help. Planning a trip can be exciting, and I'm sure you'll have a great time exploring the nearby city. If you have any more questions or need further recommendations, feel free to ask.

Remember to take your time, be flexible, and enjoy the process of planning your trip. Don't hesitate to reach out if you need any more assistance or advice.

Safe travels, and I hope you have a fantastic weekend getaway!

(And don't forget to try out Insight Timer and cook some delicious Italian dishes before your trip!)
